note:
Mark Zupo is an award-winning real estate entrepreneur, business consultant, and marketing geek whose passion is helping people and businesses grow personally and professionally.
For more than 26 years, Mark has been helping others critically examine their online businesses from new perspectives and to identify gaps and missing systems. As the founder of The Mean Mentor program, Mark helps individuals and business owners connect, share experience, resources, tips, and expertise to succeed in the

name: Real Estate
value: Everyone needs shelter. Everyone needs real estate, a home, a place to be safe and feel safe.

name: Success
value: Noone is a failure that has experience. Anyone can learn from someone else who has other experience you have yet to know.

name: Mastery
value: To be the best is to know you are well studied, educated, experienced and focused.

name: Belief
value: The key to belief comes from a better understanding your surroundings, your supporters and your ideals. To believe, you must first understand and then think critically, with logic and use every resource to verify your belief is credible.
